pr_title: Run websocket autobahn-testsuite with docker in junit test

timeline.message:
run WebSocket Autobahn tests in java code using Testcontainers

Signed-off-by: Lachlan Roberts <lachlan@webtide.com>

fix file permissions on websocket autobahn generated test reports

Signed-off-by: Lachlan Roberts <lachlan@webtide.com>

only chown autobahn reports if directory exists

Signed-off-by: Lachlan Roberts <lachlan@webtide.com>

debug to find jenkins workspace

Signed-off-by: Lachlan Roberts <lachlan@webtide.com>

wip

use try resource for container

Signed-off-by: olivier lamy <oliver.lamy@gmail.com>

use userdir only

copy all .json and .html reports from docker container

Signed-off-by: Lachlan Roberts <lachlan@webtide.com>

fix checkstyle issues

turn json reports to surefire reports

Signed-off-by: olivier lamy <oliver.lamy@gmail.com>

copy fuzzing config at start of the container

localhost cannot work on kubernetes

use different name for test case result name

Signed-off-by: olivier lamy <oliver.lamy@gmail.com>

increase the overall startup timeout to 2hours

Signed-off-by: Lachlan Roberts <lachlan@webtide.com>

do not report unimplemented tests as failures

Signed-off-by: Lachlan Roberts <lachlan@webtide.com>
Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/jetty-10.0.x' into jetty-10.0.x-AutobahnDocker

exclude incorrect test case 7.9.6

Signed-off-by: Lachlan Roberts <lachlan@webtide.com>

cleanups of AutobahnTests

Signed-off-by: Lachlan Roberts <lachlan@webtide.com>

use the custom jettyproject/autobahn-testsuite image

Signed-off-by: Lachlan Roberts <lachlan@webtide.com>

fail the junit test if there were any failed test cases

Signed-off-by: Lachlan Roberts <lachlan@webtide.com>

activate autobahn tests only for ci profile

Signed-off-by: olivier lamy <oliver.lamy@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: @olamy it would be good if we could still run the tests in intellij without having to set a system property. Is there anyway we can do this.
timeline.author: lachlan-roberts

replies.bodyText: ah yes good point (haha because I'm not running test via IDE :) ) I will change that
replies.author: olamy

timeline.message:
exclude autobahn via surefire property

not needed anymore

use autobahn to not run it per default

timeline.bodyText: @olamy Will this not run AutoBahnTests.java by default or exclude the whole websocket-core-tests module?
timeline.author: lachlan-roberts

replies.bodyText: @lachlan-roberts  all tests will be run with this profile
